version_description:
• Support for iOS 9.​
• Long-press to copy a number in your contacts or call history.
• Fixed issue where the contact's name was not displayed when ​receiving an incoming call.

• Removed feature where a new "call through" contact would be automatically added or updated when placing a call using the call through option.
• Removed the GSM Call option when long-pressing a number from your contacts or call history details, to prevent unintended charges.
• New "My Account" tab added for easy access to My Account from any screen.
• Improved contacts screen design.
• Fixed issue where only up to 24 contacts were visible in icon view on the quickdial screen.

CallKit support on iOS10:
・ Calls can now be easily answered from the lock screen. You will not need to unlock the screen before answering your calls anymore.
・ You can place 050 Free calls from your phone's native contacts app. Open a contact and long-press the phone icon to select the app to place your call with.

・ Improved iOS 12 compatibility.
・ Fixed a bug when handling multiple simultaneous incoming calls via push notification.
・ Improved battery efficiency.
・ Several minor bug fixes and improvements.
・ Changed app name from 050 Free to My 050.

・改進了iOS 13的兼容性。
・修復和改進幾個小錯誤。

・与iPhone12设备上的运行兼容性。
・修复錯誤漏洞并提高了稳定性。
